data.title: Mardy Fish Net Worth, Age, Wiki, Wife, Ethnicity
data.meta_description: Mardy Fish Net Worth: Based on the information available on the internet Mardy Fish's net worth is approximately $4 million.
data.text:
People are searching for information about former American professional tennis player Mardy Fish such as Mardy Fish Net Worth, Age, Wiki, Wife, and Ethnicity, so we are here to help. You get all the authentic information you need. This blog is dedicated to providing you with accurate information, so keep reading and supporting us. If you want to know more about Mardy Fish then this article is specifically for you.

Mardy Simpson Fish popularly known as Mardy Fish is an American former professional tennis player who was a hardcourt specialist. He is one of several American tennis players who rose to prominence in the early 2000s. He won six tournaments on the main ATP Tour and reached the final of four Masters Series events: Cincinnati in 2003 and 2010, Indian Wells in 2008, and Montreal in 2011. His best results at Grand Slam tournaments are reaching the quarterfinals of the 2007 Australian Open, the 2008 US Open, and the 2011 Wimbledon Championships. At the 2004 Summer Olympic Games, Fish reached the final in the men’s singles, losing to Nicolás Massú.

In April 2011, he overtook compatriot Andy Roddick to become the American No. 1 in the ATP rankings, reaching a career-high singles ranking of world No. 7 in August 2011. He then played in the year-end tournament for the only time in his career. He retired after the 2015 US Open. In January 2019, he replaced Jim Courier as captain of the United States Davis Cup team.

Mardy Fish Net Worth

Based on the information available on the internet Mardy Fish’s net worth is approximately $4 million. By profession, he is an American former professional tennis player who was a hardcourt specialist.

Mardy Fish Age, Wiki

Mardy Simpson Fish was born on 9 December 1981 in Edina, Minnesota, United States. He is 42 years old. His zodiac sign is Sagittarius. He follows Christianity. In 1986, his family moved to Vero Beach, Florida. He is well educated. Mardy attended Vero Beach High School for 10 grade, then moved to Boca Prep in Boca Raton, Florida, for his junior and senior high school years. He later attended Boca Prep International School.

Fish hasn’t shared much information related to his early and personal life with the media or on any social media. Whenever we find more information related to this topic then we update this article.

Mardy Fish Wife, Children

Mardy Fish’s marital status is married. He married Stacey Gardner who is a California attorney and “Briefcase Model” on NBC’s Deal or No Deal, in a Jewish wedding ceremony in September 2008. His wife is a Jewish. Together they have a child whose name is Beckett Gardner Fish.

He hasn’t shared much information related to his married life with the media or on any social media. Whenever we find more information related to this topic then we update this article.

Mardy Fish Parents, Siblings

Fish’s parents’ names are Tom Fish (father) and Sally Fish (mother). His father is a tennis teaching professional and his mother is a housewife. He has a sibling whose name is Meredith Fish. He hasn’t shared much information related to his family with the media or on any social media. Whenever we find more information related to this topic then we update this article.

Mardy Fish Ethnicity, Nationality

Fish’s ethnicity is White and his nationality is American.

Mardy Fish Height, Weight

Fish’s height is around 6 feet 2 inches and his weight is around 82 kilograms.
